00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RLaserData"
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/rprimitive/rstring.h>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 #include "rlaserdata.h"
00026 
00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00028 
00029     RDK2_FACTORY(RLaserData);
00030     
00031     using namespace RDK2::SensorData;
00032     using namespace std;
00033     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00034     
00035     void RLaserData::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00036     {
00037         r->startReading(getClassName());
00038             laserPose.x = r->read_f32();
00039             laserPose.y = r->read_f32();
00040             laserPose.z = r->read_f32();
00041             laserPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00042             laserPose.phi = r->read_f32();
00043             laserPose.gamma = r->read_f32();
00044             odometryPose.x = r->read_f32();
00045             odometryPose.y = r->read_f32();
00046             odometryPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00047             estimatedPose.x = r->read_f32();
00048             estimatedPose.y = r->read_f32();
00049             estimatedPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00050             minReading = r->read_f32();
00051             maxReading = r->read_f32();
00052             minTheta = r->read_f32();
00053             maxTheta = r->read_f32();
00054             timestamp= r->read_f32();
00055             ipc_timestamp = r->read_f32();
00056             tag = r->readString();
00057             ipc_hostname = r->readString();
00058             uint nrays = (uint) r->read_i32();
00059             if (nrays > 400) {
00060                 r->doneReading();
00061                 throw ReadingException("What the devil?");
00062             }
00063             points.resize(nrays);
00064             double* buf;
00065             size_t buflen;
00066             r->readBytes((void**)&buf, &buflen);
00067     /*      minTheta = -M_PI;
00068             maxTheta = M_PI;*/
00069             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Dio %.2f %.2f %d", minTheta, maxTheta, nrays);
00070             double step = (maxTheta - minTheta) / nrays;
00071             for (size_t i = 0; i < nrays; i++) {
00072                 points[i].theta = step * i + minTheta; //JMK Q(o), minTheta here is NEEDED serialzation sucked!!!!!!!!!!
00073                 points[i].reading = buf[i];
00074                 //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("A %d %.2f", i, buf[i]);
00075                 points[i].intensity = 1.;
00076             }
00077             delete[] buf;
00078             r->readBytes((void**)&buf, &buflen);
00079             delete[] buf;
00080         r->doneReading();
00081     }
00082     
00083     void RLaserData::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00084     {
00085         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00086             w->write_f32(laserPose.x);
00087             w->write_f32(laserPose.y);
00088             w->write_f32(laserPose.z);
00089             w->write_f32(laserPose.theta);
00090             w->write_f32(laserPose.phi);
00091             w->write_f32(laserPose.gamma);
00092             w->write_f32(odometryPose.x);
00093             w->write_f32(odometryPose.y);
00094             w->write_f32(odometryPose.theta);
00095             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.x);
00096             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.y);
00097             w->write_f32(estimatedPose.theta);
00098             w->write_f32(minReading);
00099             w->write_f32(maxReading);
00100             w->write_f32(minTheta);
00101             w->write_f32(maxTheta);
00102             w->write_f32(timestamp.getSeconds());
00103             w->write_f32(ipc_timestamp.getSeconds());
00104             w->writeString(tag);
00105             w->writeString(ipc_hostname);
00106             w->write_i32((int) points.size());
00107             double* buf = new double[points.size()];
00108             for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); i++) buf[i] = points[i].reading;
00109             w->writeBytes((void*)buf, (points.size()) * sizeof(double));
00110             w->writeBytes((void*)buf, (110) * sizeof(double));
00111             delete[] buf;
00112             //cout << "dio" << endl;
00113         w->doneWriting();
00114     }
00115     
00116     string RLaserData::getLogLine() const
00117     {
00118         ostringstream oss;
00119         oss << "FLASER " << points.size() << " ";
00120         for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); i++) {
00121             oss << points[i].reading << " ";
00122         }
00123         oss << odometryPose.x << " ";
00124             oss << odometryPose.y << " ";
00125             oss << odometryPose.theta << " ";
00126             oss << estimatedPose.x << " ";
00127             oss << estimatedPose.y << " ";
00128             oss << estimatedPose.theta << " ";
00129             oss << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " ";
00130             oss << ipc_hostname << " ";
00131             oss << ipc_timestamp.getMsFromMidnight();
00132         return oss.str();
00133     }
00134     
00135     bool RLaserData::loadFromLogLine(cstr line)
00136     {
00137         istringstream iss(line);
00138         string name;
00139         iss >> name;
00140         if (name != "FLASER") {
00141             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("The log line must start with FLASER");
00142             return false;
00143         }
00144         uint pointSize;
00145         iss >> pointSize;
00146         points.resize(pointSize);
00147         // XXX guessing... one ray for each degree
00148         double dd = pointSize * M_PI / 180;
00149         minReading = 0.02;
00150         maxReading = 80.;
00151         minTheta = -dd/2;
00152         maxTheta = dd/2;
00153         double da = dd/pointSize;
00154         for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); i++) {
00155             iss >> points[i].reading;
00156             points[i].theta = minTheta + da*i;
00157         }
00158         iss >> odometryPose.x >> odometryPose.y >> odometryPose.theta;
00159         iss >> estimatedPose.x >> estimatedPose.y >> estimatedPose.theta;
00160         unsigned long a;
00161         iss >> a;
00162         timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00163         iss >> ipc_hostname;
00164         iss >> a;
00165         ipc_timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00166         return true;
00167     }
